attributes.additional_details: We need to make everyone aware of this! It's really not fair to these poor animals!
attributes.background: Is make-up really worth it? We are harming animals just because people are selfish and only care for their looks. The images that no one sees is horrific and so shocking! Have you ever had a pet rabbit or hamster (etc) well, could you imagine them being tested on? No... Exactly.

rejection.details: You could start a petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to ban the testing of cosmetics on animals in the UK - or to ban the sale in the UK of cosmetic products that have been tested on animals.
